author: jeffyang1
title: Functional cardano hardware
description:
How can we get more hardware to be designed for the Cardano community?
What kind of hardware can we produce that everyone will want to buy?
importance: Most people do not understand the digital world still. Having awesome functional hardware built by Cardano will accelerate adoptions.
success: Hardware that is built by the Cardano community at everyone's house, that gets used daily.
